core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Fû indicates that there will be free course and progress (in what it denotes). (The subject of it) finds no one to distress him in his exits and entrances; friends come to him, and no error is committed. He will return and repeat his (proper) course. In seven days comes his return. There will be advantage in whatever direction movement is made.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: The turning point after breakdown. Vital energy comes back online. You correct course and return to right conduct. Quiet, honest re-alignment is fully supported. Acting aggressively from confusion — especially trying to mobilize others — backfires hard and creates long-term damage.

translations.text: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject returning (from an error) of no great extent, which would not proceed to anything requiring repentance. There will be great good fortune.
初九：不遠復，無祗悔，元吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: You turn back before you've gone too far off-path. Because the course correction happens early, there's no real guilt — and it's hugely auspicious.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows the admirable return (of its subject). There will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: A calm, voluntary return. No drama, no force. You come back to what’s right in a rested, natural way — and that’s lucky.

translations.text: The third SIX, divided, shows one who has made repeated returns. The position is perilous, but there will be no error.

lines.normalized_meaning: You keep slipping and having to come back again and again. That pattern is risky — but if you stay aware and keep correcting, you aren’t blamed.

translations.text: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject moving right in the centre (among those represented by the other divided lines), and yet returning alone (to his proper path).

lines.normalized_meaning: You walk the middle path and still choose to realign even if no one else does. Personal integrity overrides group drift.

translations.text: The fifth SIX, divided, shows the noble return of its subject. There will be no ground for repentance.

lines.normalized_meaning: A sincere, steady return to truth. This is morally solid and leaves nothing to apologize for.

translations.text: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject all astray on the subject of returning. There will be evil. There will be calamities and errors. If with his views he put the hosts in motion, the end will be a great defeat, whose issues will extend to the ruler of the state. Even in ten years he will not be able to repair the disaster.
上六：迷復，凶，有災眚。用行師，終有大敗，以其國君，凶。至於十年，不克征。

lines.normalized_meaning: Lost, refuses to come back. If you try to act from that delusion — especially leading others — it ends in ruin that can take years to recover from.
